titleStmt.title: SII 19.190: original edition by G.V. Srinivasa Rao, Dines Chandra Sircar and G.S. Gai
No. 190. (A.R. No. 127 of 1925.) TIRUVĀDUTUṚAI, MAYURAM TALUK, TANJAVUR DISTRICT. ON THE SOUTH WALL OF THE CENTRAL SHRINE, GŌMUKTĪŚVARA TEMPLE.

summary.p: The ends of the lines are built in. This records a sale of 2 mā and odd of land tax-free, for 15 kāśu received by them by the sabhā of Śāttanūr a brahmadēya in Tiraimūr-nāḍu on the southern bank of the river, from Ōmāśi Oṟṟiyūraṉ Kūttaṉ of Tiruvānaikkā a dēvadāna and brahmadēya in Kiḷiyūr-nāḍu, who endowed the same for the supply of 108 pots of water (from the Kāvēri) for the sacred bath of god Mahādēva at Tiruvāvaḍuturai on the day of Uttarāyaṇa-saṅkrānti every year.

revisionDesc.change: Conversion of digital encoding to DHARMA encoding scheme according to EGD (Encoding Guide for Diplomatic Editions)

div.p:
svasti śrī . kopparakesaripanmaṟku yāṇṭu 7Āvatu teṉkarait tiraimurnāṭṭu brahmadeyañ cāttūr sabhaiyom Ivvūr śrītiruvāvaṭutuṟaimahādevarkku Uttarāyana saṅkrān=tikku snapanañceyya mūṉṟu kācu-� nūṟṟeṭṭuk kalacattukkuk kiḷiyūrnāṭṭu devadāṉa brahmadeyam tiruvāṉaikkāvil Omāci Oṟṟiyūraṉ kūttaṉ Āḷvārkkuk kuṭutta kācu 10 5 patiṉaiñcuṅkoṇṭu candrādityavat viṟṟuk kuṭuttom viṟṟukkuṭutta nilam Iv vūrppāl kiṭakkum
llai vāykkuraiykku vaṭakkum melpāṟkellai kaviṇiyaṉ caṅkaraṉ māṟaṉ nilattukkuk kiḻakkum vaṭapāṟkellai jalaśayaṉattudevar nilattukkut teṟkum Innāṉkellaiyilu makappaṭṭa nilam kha9ma� kuḻi khande Innilam kāleyaraik kāṇi Arai mun=tiri kaikkiḻ Oṉpatu mākkāṇiyil kiḻakkaṭaiya Ivvāḷvārkku tirunan=tavāṉappuṟam muṉṟumā nikki Iraṇṭu mā mukkāṇi Arai mun=tirikaik kiḻ Oṉpatu mākkāṇi nilamum viṟṟuk kuṭutta vilaip poruḷum Iṟai kāvalukkumāka Ippatiṉaintuñcuṅ koṇṭu viṟṟukkuṭuttom candrāditya- vaṟ śrīkoyil vāriyañ ceyvā
